Title: RHBA-2017:2100: GTK+ bug fix update (None)
Description:
The GTK+ packages contain the GIMP ToolKit (GTK+), a library for creating graphical user interfaces for the X Window System. 

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.4 Release Notes linked from the References section.

Users of GTK+ are advised to upgrade to these updated packages.

Bugzillas.Title: Backport upstream "alternate trust paths" fix to glib-networking in RHEL 7
glib2-fam prints an extra string and breaks gnome-ssh-askpass
Unable to resize evince windows in MWM
glib2-2.46.2-4.el7 needs to be patched: causes a crash in Firefox 52 file open/save dialog
Unlocalized strings and fuzzy translations in ja, zh_TW
